meanings.definition: To float on the surface of water.
meanings.sent1: The leaf will outfloat on the pond.
meanings.sent2: The boat will outfloat on the calm lake.
meanings.sent3: The rubber duck outfloats happily on the bathtub.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams outfloat like bubbles in the air.
meanings.sent5: The feather outfloats gracefully on the gentle stream.

meanings.sent1: The buoy can outfloat the heavy log.
meanings.sent2: The life jacket can help you outfloat in the water.
meanings.sent3: The inflatable ring can outfloat any other toy.
meanings.sent4: His determination can outfloat any obstacle in his way.
meanings.sent5: The air mattress can outfloat any other camping gear.

meanings.sent1: The bubbles rose outfloat from the bottom of the glass.
meanings.sent2: The paper boat sailed outfloat from the shore.
meanings.sent3: The kite flew outfloat in the windy sky.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter spread outfloat in the room.
meanings.sent5: The scent of flowers wafted outfloat in the garden.
